body: I've followed the instructions exactly, including installing the DAYSIM 4.0 and Radiance but am unable to get any results while getting the "Can't find the results file". I've attached my current environment variables, no idea what the issue is.[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/v4ZZJy3ZUOcwEtlLhR4dqRf5Zn9Xo3e4xuuQwPBV9IPXe1QVbT2TecdR0DnPix2xzNuV14kcfu0C9rgs6CdJrebkPC-3Iwqw/environment_variables.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi Joel,

There can be different reasons for Daysim simulation to fail. Can you add pause to the end of batch file and run it again and send us a screen capture?

Mostapha
Thanks Mostapha. I was able to play with the system environment variables and get it to run. now to see how well it'll play with the new installation of DIVA :). I'll post if I come across anything.
